title: [Neuroscience] More than 40% of those with multiple sclerosis (MS) said theyâ€™ve used cannabis products in the past year to help with chronic pain and sleep (n=1,027). These two symptoms are common and often go together in this chronic neurological disease.

[Health] Though Ohio never formally enacted a so-called "heartbeat bill" banning abortions, legal actions appear to have fueled beliefs that abortion is illegal in the state. One in 10 Ohio women thought abortion illegal amid attempts to ban at 6 weeks.
